attributes.additional_details:
To protect women like myself. Although, women also abuse men it is statistically proven more men abuse women. I want to see changes and more punishment to those who continue to repeatedly abuse women. A Domestic Abuse register should be available to anyone who wants to check if the person they are dating is on that register. 
I have seen for myself, the abuser continue to beat women repeatedly and get away with it. Get this register out there and known to protect innocent people. Make a change
attributes.background: Like sex offenders domestic abusers should be made to sign and stay on the domestic abuse register. It should be introduced for repeat offenders to ensure others safety when meeting the abuser.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/713569
